subject: re:Introduce special discounts for all our customers
body:
Dear customer.
Do you shop for drugs on the Web regularly? If yes, read this letter to the end since it contains the information you will definitely find useful.
At CanadianPharmacy you will always be able to find the generic drugs you need, and they will be a lot cheaper that those sold in the USA. CanadianPharmacy is a licensed Canadian e-shop, which lets it (and you too) turn the Canadian drug taxation system to its advantage.
CanadianPharmacy - the best that modern medicine can offer you, plus the best Canadian prices.
Sincerely yours,Sharlene Mata
